full_summary:
================================
### Tender Announcement: Demolition of Housing Units BT04 and BT06 and Design and Construction of a New 96-Bed Living Unit

#### Solicitation Information
- **Reference Number:** WS4006959283-Doc4157083623
- **Solicitation Number:** WS4006959283
- **Amendment Number:** 5
#### Tender Dates
- **Publication Date:** September 5, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** October 13, 2023, 14:00:00
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** [To be determined]
- **Expected Contract End Date:** December 31, 2023
#### Notice Type and Method
- **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
#### Contracting Information
- **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
  - **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
  - **Contact Person:** Lauren Woodhall (SPAC/PSPC)
  - **Contact Email:** lauren.woodhall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Description of Work
Public Works and Government Services Canada invites firms of Architects and their Sub-Consultants to submit a proposal for the provision of architectural services related to the demolition of housing units BT04 and BT06 and the design and construction of a new 96-Bed Living Unit.

Please note that all tender documents and a detailed description of technical requirements can be found at the Ariba Discovery website: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17364403?extsite=MTczNjQ0MDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.

**Submission Requirements**

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on October 13, 2023, by 14:00:00 EDT. Submitted bids after this time will be deemed non-responsive.

#### Important Trade Agreements

This solicitation is subject to the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), among others.

We appreciate your interest in this solicitation and look forward to reviewing your proposal submissions.
